job_history.work_description: Directly responsible for customer satisfaction in clinical document turnaround time and quality. Directly aided in eliminating document turnaround time and quality penalties by driving the consistent achievement of 97% document turnaround time and 95% document quality. Prepared and presented client account performance reports and executive level scorecards. Trained medical records staff and providers on transcription applications, document search engines and dictation machines both on site and remotely.

Customer facing, first point of contact for all day to day issues, projects or concerns. Worked directly with HIM Directors, Physicians and COO for assigned healthcare facilities. Conducted customer touch base calls to review account performance, goals reached and expected metrics. Developed and presented monthly reporting statistics for each customer.

Oversaw transcription workflow process of three office locations in Southern California. Maintained all dictated reports to ensure compliance with service level agreements. Hired, supervised and trained a large staff of Work Flow personnel. Had success in crew retention and loyalty.

education.university: East San Gabriel Valley Occupational Program

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple projects and teams, including the transcription workflow process and customer care, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held leadership roles, including training and supervising staff, and managing customer relationships, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Worked directly with customers, including HIM Directors, Physicians, and COO, and conducted customer touch base calls, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Helped eliminate document turnaround time and quality penalties, and maintained compliance with service level agreements, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Prepared and presented client account performance reports and executive level scorecards, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.explanation: Trained medical records staff and providers on transcription applications, document search engines, and dictation machines, indicating solid working proficiency.
